Overview: Blocks with mechanical functions, Mechanical Blocks are blocks that move by the Logic Blocks, seat, or another Mechanical Block.
Summary: Mechanical Blocks are blocks with mechanical functions that interact with other components to enable movement and other mechanical actions. They include Hinges, Suspension, Rotators, and Other blocks.

Blocks.Type_description: Blocks with limited rotation, perfect for use in steering or for attaching parts with limited movement.

Items.title: Steering Hinge
Items.caption: Allows a limited angle of rotation perfect for wheels.

Items.title: Large Hinge
Items.caption: Allows a limited angle of rotation perfect for wheels.

Items.title: Trailer Hinge
Items.caption: Ball hinge with two attachment points.

Items.title: Racing Hinge
Items.caption: Allows a limited angle of rotation perfect for wheels of a fast race car.

Blocks.Type_description: Blocks that absorb shock to make your vehicle drive smoother on uneven surfaces.

Items.title: Suspension Spring
Items.caption: Absorbs shock to make your vehicle drive smoother on uneven surfaces.

Items.title: Straight Suspension
Items.caption: Absorbs shock to make your vehicle drive smoother on uneven surfaces.

Blocks.Type_description: Blocks that rotate or spin, often used for precise or quick movement.

Items.title: Rotating Servo
Items.caption: Block that can slowly rotate in each direction.

Items.title: Spinning Servo
Items.caption: Block that can spin around quickly.

Items.title: Helicopter Engine
Items.caption: Block that can spin around quickly.

Items.title: Stackable Helicopter Engine
Items.caption: A helicopter engine with a static top and bottom.

Blocks.Type_description: Miscellaneous blocks with special mechanical functions.

Items.title: Piston
Items.caption: Extendable cylinder that moves back and forth.
Items.other: Useful extension Values: *1/2 block - 0.17 *1 block - 0.33 *3/2 blocks - 0.5 *2 blocks - 0.67 *5/2 blocks - 0.84

Items.title: Detachable Block
Items.caption: Detaches the structure it is attached to.

Items.title: Gyro
Items.caption: Adds rotational control and damping to your vehicle.

Items.title: Gyro Stabilizer
Items.caption: Stabilizing gyro that slowly rotates your vehicle towards the up direction of the block.

Items.title: Power Coupling
Items.caption: A flexible electric connection between blocks.
